dct_title_s: Terræ Israel omnis ante Canaan dictæ in tribvs vndecim distributæ accvratissima et ad sacras historias intelligendas opportvniss cvm vicinaru gentivm adscriptione tabvla et exactissimo mansionvm XLIII sitv
dct_alternative_sm: Terrae Israel omnis ante Canaan dictae in tribus undecim distributae accuratissima et ad sacras historias intelligendas opportuniss cum vicinaru gentium adscriptione tabula et exactissimo mansionum XLIII situ
dct_description_sm: ad sacri apparatus instructionem a Bened. Aria Montano descripta ; [Pieter van der Heyden].
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, travel routes, settlements, places of historical interest.
Features illustrations of ships and sea monsters.
Appears in Plantin's Polyglot Bible, Biblia Sacra Hebraice, Chaldaice, Graece, & Latine, 1572.
